headline: Needham Affirms Workday Inc. (WDAY) ‘Buy’ Rating on Growth Bounce Back
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY) is one of the best tech stocks to buy for the long term. On September 9, Needham reiterated a Buy rating and a $300 price target. The research firm remains bullish about the company even as it expects it to lower its fiscal year 2027 subscription revenue growth from 15% to 13%. […]
